au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=4m_L2=1p3m_offset_apx7p5
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value config.att = 330 config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 510 config.det_offset = 300 config.srce = 150 config.guide = 'g7' config.apx = -47 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 34.7079 config.beamcenterz = 95.7827 config.drive()
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(39, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(330)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(39, 0) driveBsz(258)
